Reviews.Title: Claro logo while booting but this is the only negative thing
Reviews.Author: Oleksandr Davydenko
Reviews.Content: Great picture, big battery (i can use like for 2-3 hours gps and at night it's still 40% charged), so-so camera. In general: 4 of 5.

Reviews.Title: excellent phone!
Reviews.Author: charles999
Reviews.Content: This moto superphone is fast, the display is so detail and beautiful and big enough for easy web browsing.  The battery life is so good, I think it is the best in all 4.7" android.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Linwood
Reviews.Content: The Razr HD is a superb phone.  It is quick to process actions, has a great storage capacity, and the battery life is phenomenal. I would recommend this device to any one who desires a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Brendon dassow
Reviews.Content: This phone Has amazing battery life. Very durable. Its very fast . This phone exceeded my expectations. Money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel
Reviews.Content: Cheaper than iPhone or galaxy, but this phone looks great and get the job done. Much more design than the popular ones but since engineering point of view is better designed and manufactured, very good materials, fast and easy to use, I'm very happy with this phone

Reviews.Title: Awsome smartphone!
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Marinho Barbosa
Reviews.Content: Great product. I recommend it to anyone who want to buy because of embedded technology offered besides beautiful slim design.

Reviews.Title: Light, fast, durable
Reviews.Author: Clayster
Reviews.Content: I could go on and on!  This is by far the best phone I have ever used including many Samsungs, iphone, droid x, droid, htc, etc.  Very thin and light for the size but still one of the most durable phones made by any manufacturer.  Gorilla glass holds up great, kevlar backing is super strong and it's water "proof" as well.  I don't even use a case with this phone it's so tough.  Samsung(body) and Apple (screen) products generally fall apart with any abuse.  Good camera, fast, big bright HD screen and good battery life make this a winner!

Reviews.Title: Great device, long battery life, nice and sharp screen colors
Reviews.Author: Michael Fogel
Reviews.Content: Long life battery, nice and sharp screen colors, great and easy MMI, work fast even when loaded and running with few app

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy with this phone
Reviews.Author: Ulises Rojas Perez "Fan Huinday"
Reviews.Content: -Cheaper than iPhone or galaxy, but this phone looks great and get the job done.- Much more design than the popular ones but since engineering point of view is better designed and manufactured, very good materials, fast and easy to use, I'm very happy with this phone

Reviews.Title: By far the nicest phone I have ever seen
Reviews.Author: nicholas clinton
Reviews.Content: I considered iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, HTC One, but those phones aren't even close to the quality of the Motorola.  Very, very nice.
